ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
h = url
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));

c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"/user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"/user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list = []
list1 = java.getElements('.list3.0')
var callback = result.match(/var callback='([^']+)/)[1]
var bid = result.match(/"load_more\('([^']+)'/)[1]
function base64(_str){var staticchars="PXhw7UT1B0a9kQDKZsjIASmOezxYG4CHo5Jyfg2b8FLpEvRr3WtVnlqMidu6cN";var encodechars="";for(var i=0;i<_str.length;i++){var num0=staticchars.indexOf(_str[i]);if(num0==-1){var code=_str[i]}else{var code=staticchars[(num0+3)%62]}var num1=parseInt(Math.random()*62,10);var num2=parseInt(Math.random()*62,10);encodechars+=staticchars[num1]+code+staticchars[num2]}return encodechars}
var head = JSON.stringify({"headers": {"Referer": baseUrl}})
var url = 'https://www.quanben.io/index.php?c=book&a=list.jsonp&callback=' + callback + '&book_id=' + bid + '&b=' + base64(callback) + ',' + head;
list2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url).match(/\(({.*})\)/)[1]).content
list3 = java.getElements('.list3.1')
list = list.concat(list1).concat(list2).concat(list3)
list.join('')
</js>ul li a

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let list = [];
let $ = JSON.parse(result);
// let aid = $.info.articleid;
let aid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)\.json/)[1];
$.list.forEach((c) => {
  let text = c.chaptername;
  let xid = Math.floor(aid/1000);
  let href = `${source.key}/du/${aid}/${c.chapterid}.html`; 
  list.push({text:text, href:href});
})
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
result=java.ajax("http://"+result.match(/\("\/\/(.*\/data\/.*?)"/)[1])
</js>
@js:
if(result.match(/replace/)){
s=result.match(/replace.*?\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/\\/g,'\\\\')
num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}
	}else{
result
if(result.match(/txt_call/)){
	result="因网站问题没有正文"
	}
		}
result.replace(/(\\)+n/g,'<\/br>').replace(/.*?:"/,'').replace(/",".*/,'').replace(/"\}.*/,'').replace(/\\/g,'')

	var x=baseUrl;
 cookie.removeCookie(x);
	java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证");
 result=java.ajax(x);
 }
result
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
base = source.getKey();
function b64Url(str) {
    return `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(str)},{"type":"xg"}`; 
}
lis = java.getElements('#newlist.0@dd a');
var list = [];
for (var i = 0; i < lis.length; i++) {
     var href = lis[i].attr('href');
     var text = lis[i].text();
     if (/javascript/.test(href)) {
        if ( i < lis.length - 1 ) {
            var url = b64Url("https://www.baidu.com" + lis[i + 1].attr('href'));         
        } else {
            var url = b64Url("https://cn.bing.com" + lis[i - 1].attr('href'));
        }
     } else { var url = base + href; }
     // java.log(lis[i].text()+":"+url);
     list.push({"text": text, "href": url});
}

list
</js>
